body.p: My. Commission, as Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, for the State of California, expires on the 19th June next. By this same Mail. I write to Gov. Magoffin, asking another commission and I now take the liberty of asking your kind offices, in my behalf.
Should my request be granted, upon the receipt of the Commission, the fee will be remitted, with my affidavit.
I may not have the pleasure of being known to you, and therefore, beg leave to refer you to my brother in law, Thomas N Lindsey, of Frankfort.

Very Respectfully
Yr obt Servt.
C J Brenham

To.
Honl Thos B Monroe Jr.
Secy of State.
Frankfort
Ky.
